pr_title: Remove reference to metrics classes in deployment

timeline.message: Remove reference to metrics classes in deployment

timeline.bodyText: If it uses micrometer, how are the metrics reported?
timeline.author: cescoffier

replies.bodyText: They aren't (yet). I was going to have another conversation with you about what metrics should be emitted w/ micrometer. (The metrics in this Decorator are only expected if MP Metrics is present, and I am not sure they're useful enough to preserve?)
replies.author: ebullient
